resources.string: It appears that you do not currently have any servers to choose from, please add your server details by selecting \"Add Server\" from the menu.

--Add a Server--
 Press "Menu" from the main screen, and select "Add Server"

 --Useful commands--
 status : Display server and player information
 kick "name" : Kick player with corresponding name
 kickid "steamid" : Kick player with corresponding steamID


For additional help or feature requests, email iamvixxor@gmail.com
